name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let Me Search | Your Bookmarks on Steroid

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Productivity & Search Tool: Instantly Save and Search Your Best Finds on the Internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CAPTURE AND RECALL INFORMATION
It's hard to capture and recall information later. Ever email yourself a link or save a screenshot in a folder on your computer? If so, then this may be the solution you've been looking for.


MAKE ANYTHING SEARCHABLE
Let Me Search is the search engine for your life. Think bookmarks on steroids 💪.

Get full-text, typo tolerant, search-as-you-type personal search engine that helps you index anything on the internet while solving the pain of finding relevant information when you need it.


HOW DOES IT WORK
Once you have a Let Me Search account, use the Chrome Extension to:

💾 SAVE ANYTHING
Highlight your favorite text, save images, or entire webpages.

🔍 SEARCH INSTANTLY
Easily search, recall and revisit your saves and highlights.

📂 ORGANIZE INTO FOLDERS
Organize and Catalog Your Saves into Folders.

🏷️ FILTERING AND FACETING
Refine Your Search Results to Find Exact Matches.

👀 SHARE
Share Your Saves With Anyone Online. Allow Others to Search Your Highlights, Screenshots, and Bookmarks.

📄 SAVE TABS
Better manage your browsing experience by saving tabs for later. And yes they'll be searchable.



Get Started for FREE! Get Your Personal Search Engine Today.

Have a suggestion, question, or feedback? Please reach out: letmesearch@okaysend.com 👋
